mapper.insert: insert into `tb_purchase` ( contract_address,purchaser,image_owner, image_author, author_share,owner_share,image_id, sha3, offer, launch_time, end_time, isClosed, state) values ( #{contractAddress}, #{purchaser}, #{imageOwner}, #{imageAuthor}, #{authorShare}, #{ownerShare}, #{imageID}, #{sha3},#{offer}, #{launchTime}, #{endTime}, #{isClosed}, #{state})
mapper.select: select count(*) from `tb_purchase` where #{purchaser}=purchaser and state=#{state} and isClosed = 0
select count(*) from `tb_purchase` where #{owner}=image_owner and state=#{state} and isClosed = 0
select * from `tb_purchase` where #{imageOwner}=image_owner and end_time < NOW() and state = 1 ORDER BY end_time limit #{begin}, #{count}
select * from `tb_purchase` where #{purchaser}=purchaser and end_time < NOW() and state = 1 ORDER BY end_time limit #{begin}, #{count}

mapper.update: update `tb_purchase` set isClosed=1 where #{imageOwner}=image_owner and end_time < NOW()
